verses.verse: And Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> the heads <WH7218> of the tribes <WH4294> concerning the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> This <WH2088> is the thing <WH1697> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> hath commanded. <WH6680>

If <WH3588> a man <WH376> vow <WH5087> a vow <WH5088> unto the LORD, <WH3068> or <WH176> swear <WH7650> an oath <WH7621> to bind <WH631> <WH5921> his soul <WH5315> with a bond; <WH632> he shall not <WH3808> break <WH2490> his word, <WH1697> he shall do <WH6213> according to all <WH3605> that proceedeth out <WH3318> of his mouth. <WH4480> <WH6310>
If <WH3588> a woman <WH802> also vow <WH5087> a vow <WH5088> unto the LORD, <WH3068> and bind <WH631> herself by a bond, <WH632> being in her father's <WH1> house <WH1004> in her youth; <WH5271>

And her father <WH1> hear <WH8085> <WH853> her vow, <WH5088> and her bond <WH632> wherewith <WH834> she hath bound <WH631> <WH5921> her soul, <WH5315> and her father <WH1> shall hold his peace <WH2790> at her: then all <WH3605> her vows <WH5088> shall stand, <WH6965> and every <WH3605> bond <WH632> wherewith <WH834> she hath bound <WH631> <WH5921> her soul <WH5315> shall stand. <WH6965>

But if <WH518> her father <WH1> disallow <WH5106> her in the day <WH3117> that he heareth; <WH8085> not <WH3808> any <WH3605> of her vows, <WH5088> or of her bonds <WH632> wherewith <WH834> she hath bound <WH631> <WH5921> her soul, <WH5315> shall stand: <WH6965> and the LORD <WH3068> shall forgive <WH5545> her, because <WH3588> her father <WH1> disallowed <WH5106> her.

And if <WH518> she had at all <WH1961> <WH1961> a husband, <WH376> when she vowed, <WH5088> <WH5921> or <WH176> uttered <WH4008> aught out of her lips, <WH8193> wherewith <WH834> she bound <WH631> <WH5921> her soul; <WH5315>

And her husband <WH376> heard <WH8085> it, and held his peace <WH2790> at her in the day <WH3117> that he heard <WH8085> it: then her vows <WH5088> shall stand, <WH6965> and her bonds <WH632> wherewith <WH834> she bound <WH631> <WH5921> her soul <WH5315> shall stand. <WH6965>

But if <WH518> her husband <WH376> disallowed <WH5106> her on the day <WH3117> that he heard <WH8085> it; then he shall make <WH853> her vow <WH5088> which she vowed, <WH834> <WH5921> and that which she uttered <WH4008> with her lips, <WH8193> wherewith <WH834> she bound <WH631> <WH5921> her soul, <WH5315> of none effect: <WH6565> and the LORD <WH3068> shall forgive <WH5545> her.

But every <WH3605> vow <WH5088> of a widow, <WH490> and of her that is divorced, <WH1644> wherewith <WH834> they have bound <WH631> <WH5921> their souls, <WH5315> shall stand <WH6965> against <WH5921> her.
And if <WH518> she vowed <WH5087> in her husband's <WH376> house, <WH1004> or <WH176> bound <WH631> <WH5921> her soul <WH5315> by a bond <WH632> with an oath; <WH7621>

And her husband <WH376> heard <WH8085> it, and held his peace <WH2790> at her, and disallowed <WH5106> her not: <WH3808> then all <WH3605> her vows <WH5088> shall stand, <WH6965> and every <WH3605> bond <WH632> wherewith <WH834> she bound <WH631> <WH5921> her soul <WH5315> shall stand. <WH6965>

But if <WH518> her husband <WH376> hath utterly made them void <WH6565> <WH6565> <WH853> on the day <WH3117> he heard <WH8085> them; then whatsoever <WH3605> proceeded out <WH4161> of her lips <WH8193> concerning her vows, <WH5088> or concerning the bond <WH632> of her soul, <WH5315> shall not <WH3808> stand: <WH6965> her husband <WH376> hath made them void; <WH6565> and the LORD <WH3068> shall forgive <WH5545> her.

Every <WH3605> vow, <WH5088> and every <WH3605> binding <WH632> oath <WH7621> to afflict <WH6031> the soul, <WH5315> her husband <WH376> may establish <WH6965> it, or her husband <WH376> may make it void. <WH6565>

But if <WH518> her husband <WH376> altogether hold his peace <WH2790> <WH2790> at her from day <WH4480> <WH3117> to <WH413> day; <WH3117> then he establisheth <WH6965> <WH853> all <WH3605> her vows, <WH5088> or <WH176> <WH853> all <WH3605> her bonds, <WH632> which <WH834> are upon <WH5921> her: he confirmeth <WH6965> them, because <WH3588> he held his peace <WH2790> at her in the day <WH3117> that he heard <WH8085> them.
But if <WH518> he shall any ways make them void <WH6565> <WH6565> <WH853> after that <WH310> he hath heard <WH8085> them; then he shall bear <WH5375> <WH853> her iniquity. <WH5771>

These <WH428> are the statutes, <WH2706> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH853> Moses, <WH4872> between <WH996> a man <WH376> and his wife, <WH802> between <WH996> the father <WH1> and his daughter, <WH1323> being yet in her youth <WH5271> in her father's <WH1> house. <WH1004>
